item.description:
UPDATE: I WILL be attending this evening's Bushnell Jazz Concert. Look for me in a low beach chair. I'll have three shiny, BLUE STAR-shaped BALLOONS tied to a white stick w/ red reflector on it. To not block the view of those behind me (plus, they need more gas!) the balloons will be VERY LOW TO THE GROUND, but should be easy enough to grab your attention. If in doubt, call my CELL# (860) 690-9595 (from an easy for me to identify site) and I'll direct you towards us. The other "FREE Live Outdoor Music" concerts this week will, most likely, be held indoors or postponed due to the forecast of rain, so tonight will be the best evening to enjoy "FREE Live Outdoor Music"!

Feel free to BYO food, snacks, and beverages of choice. See you there!

FYI: These combined Single Event & MeetUp "FREE Live Outdoor Music" events have attracted between 12-60 people each time, averaging @ 20.

Meet new friends! We'll likely be playing some Bocce, too!

- Rob Pudney

***

Paul Brown Monday Night Jazz Series presented by Prudential Financial.

The series will run on consecutive Mondays through August 6.

Bushnell Park, Hartford, CT 06115

July 16, 2007 6 pm Dr. Jazz Quintet / 7:30 pm Toshiko Akiyoshi Quartet featuring Lew Tabackin

July 23, 2007 6 pm Kelly Sheppard Quintet / 7:30 pm Paul West Quintet

July 30, 2007 6 pm Jessie ?Cheese? Hameen II / 7:30 pm Rufus Reid Quintet

August 6, 2007 6 pm Fred Simmons Quartet / 7:30 pm Barry Harris Quartet

Monday Night Jazz

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends

item.name: UPDATE: TONIGHT's Jazz Series - Bushnell Park, Hartford, CT 06115
